description: /b/Mekanism/b/. Now here's where things get intresting.
/b/Mekanism/b/ brings with it /b/electric machinery/b/ and /6/mass production/6/. Be prepared for things to get a lot more expensive here on out, and to be dealing with fairly high numbers.

To start, you'll need to make the /b/Metallurgic Infuser/b/. This machine takes /b/electricity/b/, an /b/item/b/, and an /b/infusion material/b/ to produce infused materials. Items can be /6/slotted in the infuse slot to convert/6/ to an /b/infuse type/b/.
The main resources you'll want out of this are /b/Steel/b/ and /b/Cupronickel/b/.
